name: One Door Away
description:
One door Away

The game is centered on a mansion, in which the player is imprisoned. The Mansion is made up of interconnected rooms that lead to an exit, but all the rooms are inaccessible because the connecting doors are locked.

            In order to open each door the player is put to the test, each room has some kind of puzzle added to it, a puzzle that will have to be solved by the player in order to open the door and thus be closer to a the exit door ( "One Door Away"). Each puzzle is focused on different concepts of puzzle itself, going from a simple assimilation of colors or weights, reflection of lasers in mirrors ... Developed as a 3D game "One Door Away" tries to make the player submerge a little in the virtual experience and feel that it is he who is trapped and trying to escape the mansion.

            When going through each challenge, after solving the puzzle of the current room and the door open the player will also be rewarded with a piece of the last door that will have to be assembled before the same power to escape.

(University Project Still in Development)
